short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your daily dose of info delivered straight to your browser, featuring content to ignite curiosity and conversation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dailies is your daily dose of variety! Get a new question, joke, fact, and word each day, igniting your curiosity and sparking engaging conversations to brighten up your day-to-day interactions. 

❂❂❂ Features ❂❂❂

❂ Curated and Safe For Work: Our collection of hundreds of words, jokes, facts, and questions are all suitable for professional environments, making it safe to use in any setting.

❂ Simple and Lightweight: The extension seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser without any additional clutter or distractions, ensuring a smooth browsing experience.

❂ Offline Access: Access content even when offline, ensuring uninterrupted daily content.

❂ Completely Free: Enjoy the benefits of daily info without any cost to you. There are no hidden fees, ads, or subscriptions, making it accessible to all users.

⊛⊛⊛ Upcoming Features ⊛⊛⊛

⊛ Refresh: Not feeling the content? Get a single Refresh per day to change up the content of your choosing.

⊛ SFW Filter: If you’re looking for edgier content, you’ll be able to toggle off the SFW and get access to some spicier info.

⊛ More Content: Upgrading our collection from hundreds to thousands of high quality content.

⊛ Holiday Of The Day: Displays if tomorrow/today is a US national holiday
